movies.title: The Avengers
movies.synopsis: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team to save the world from Loki and his army.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.synopsis: Two imprisoned men bond over several years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: Inception
movies.synopsis: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.synopsis: When the menace known as The Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.synopsis: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.synopsis: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.synopsis: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.synopsis: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.synopsis: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: Goodfellas
movies.synopsis: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
movies.synopsis: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.synopsis: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.synopsis: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: The Godfather: Part II
movies.synopsis: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

movies.title: The Dark Knight Rises
movies.synopsis: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

movies.title: The Prestige
movies.synopsis: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.synopsis: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.synopsis: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.synopsis: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies.title: The Departed
movies.synopsis: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

movies.title: Saving Private Ryan
movies.synopsis: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

movies.title: The Green Mile
movies.synopsis: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

movies.title: The Intouchables
movies.synopsis: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

movies.title: Whiplash
movies.synopsis: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

movies.title: The Prestige
movies.synopsis: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

movies.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
movies.synopsis: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.synopsis: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.synopsis: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

movies.title: The Empire Strikes Back
movies.synopsis: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader and a bounty hunter named Boba Fett all over the galaxy.

movies.title: Friends
movies.synopsis: Friends is a 90's Comedy TV show, based in Manhattan, about 6 friends who go through just about every life experience imaginable together; love, marriage, divorce, children, heartbreaks, fights, new jobs and job losses and all sorts of drama.

movies.title: Shum Bola
movies.synopsis: "Shum bola" is a short story written by the Uzbek writer and poet Gafur Ghulam. The author wrote the work in 1936. The short story has been published several times. The story describes the artist's childhood and life in Tashkent at the beginning of the 20th century. The short story is a sharp comic work based on real events and people's fate.
